title: April 4th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: April 4th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Bruce Willis retirement, Bella Hadid first acting gig, Kardashian family update, Royal Family update and Oscar Ceremony overview
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from Bruce WIllis' retirement announcement to another Kardashian family update. See below for the topics of the week:


Bruce Willis

  • Bruce Willis to Retire due to Aphasia


Bella Hadid

  • Bella Hadid joining Season 3 of Ramy (her first ever acting role)


Kardashian Family Update

  • Rob Kardashian and Tyga clapping back at Blac Chyna
  • Kayne West Plans on Seeking Help , Won’t Make Public Appearances for Time Being
  • Julia Fox's Presence at the Oscar's After Party (outfit, upcoming book, and overall relevance)


Royal Family Update

  • The British Royals’ Trip to Jamaica has Backfired


Oscars Drama Update

  • Sneak Peak into this week's upcoming Wednesday episode where we discuss the Chris Rock, Will Smith and Jada Pinket Smith drama - we're going to be covering conspiracy theories, who's actually at fault, why is the Academy even still a thing and much more!




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
